sense.name: manmade fabrication of goods
sense.examples: Their nation is encouraging the domestic manufacture of cars and trucks. The manufacture of lead_based paint is highly regulated. The factory was reconfigured for the manufacture of paper products.

sense.name: life_supporting substances produced by an organism
sense.examples: It's the genetic blueprint for the manufacture of proteins in the body. Certain nutrients are essential to the manufacture of new while blood cells.

sense.name: a specific branch or sector of an industry
sense.examples: France became renown for its porcelain manufacture. Tool manufacture has largely moved away from that region of the country.

sense.name: fabricated commercial goods
sense.examples: Export manufacture was loaded onto container ships bound for Asia. The demand for import manufacture has increased significantly this year.
